title: Betsy & Adam Women's Flutter Sleeve Sequin Embellished V-Neck Maxi Dress
description: Model is wearing a size 4 dress. Size 4 measures approximately 61" from shoulder to hem.
This dress fits true to size.
Can be worn with any standard bra for easy, everyday comfort.
This dress is fitted at the waist and hips. The fabric has some stretch.
A stunning V-neck gown with flutter sleeves adorned with delicate embellishments, featuring a flattering fitted silhouette and elegant draping.

This elegant dress features a flattering V-neckline, adorned with delicate sequin-embellished flutter sleeves for a touch of sparkle. Its sleek silhouette and thoughtful detailing make it perfect for formal events or a special night out.
